name: Space Coliseum (Game$pawn)
description:
This is my second 2D shooter project

It's modifications are:

1) Different enemies, such as StraightBoss_Red, StraightBoss_Blue, StraightShooter_Camo, and QueenStraight_AlphaGold.

2) Lots of Levels.

3) Main Menu is different colors then original.

Credits:

Created by Elijah Cooley.
